Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_5
Text.DisplayName: Book of a Hundred Poisons Fragment
Text.Desc: Orthodox teachings of the Southern Cult in ancient times. Unfortunately, most of its contents have long been lost, there are only fragments left. This manual recorded the crafting recipes of three supreme artifacts of the Demon School.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: 
Venombane
Illusion Sphere
Sand of Destruction[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_6
Text.Desc: Orthodox teachings left by Guangcheng Zi when he achieved enlightenment. Unfortunately, most of its contents have long been lost, there are only fragments left. This manual recorded the crafting recipes of two Guangcheng's artifacts.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: \nHeavenly Measure\nThunder Talisman[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_7
Text.DisplayName: Grand Collection of Two Worlds Fragment
Text.Desc: Originally a supreme Buddhist classic, now only fragments remain, which only recorded the crafting recipes of some artifacts.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: 
Truthbringer
Golden Lotus Stand
Green Lotus Banner[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_8
Text.Desc: Secret manual circulated out of the world of Asura, it recorded the crafting recipes of many Demon Creed artifacts.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: 
Sirius Spike
Bloodsucker
Vortex Orb[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_9
Text.Desc: Mysterious book from the Otherworld, its author unknown. It is recorded that there are many secret treasures that have never been seen before in the field of traditional cultivation.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: \nStardust Shuttle\nSpellbound Scissors[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_MiBao_10

Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifacts: \nWhite Cloud Banner[/color][/size]
